title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
description: As a customer, I want to securely log in using multiple verification methods so that my account remains protected.
attributes_and_rules: Verify identity through SMS, email, or authenticator apps. Comply with banking security and regulatory standards.
core_domain_objects: Verification Methods, Session Management, Identity Management
acceptance_criteria: Customers can log in using multi-factor authentication with different verification methods.
test_cases: Given a customer, When they try to log in, Then the system should prompt for a second verification method.

title: Implement Session Timeouts
description: As a customer, I want session timeouts after a period of inactivity so that my session remains secure.
attributes_and_rules: Force session timeouts after predefined periods of inactivity.
acceptance_criteria: Session expires and requires re-login after the idle timeout period.
test_cases: Given a logged-in session, When the period of inactivity exceeds the limit, Then the session should be timed out, requiring re-login.

title: Implement Account Lockout after Repeated Failed Attempts
description: As a customer, I want my account to be locked after several failed login attempts so that unauthorized access is prevented.
attributes_and_rules: Lock account after a set number of failed attempts.
acceptance_criteria: Account is locked after a specific number of failed login attempts.
test_cases: Given multiple failed login attempts, When the number of attempts exceeds the threshold, Then the account should be locked.

title: Display Personalized Content on Dashboard
description: As a customer, I want to see personalized content based on my banking profile and eligibility so that I can access relevant information easily.
attributes_and_rules: Display customer-specific data and product recommendations.
core_domain_objects: Customer Data, Banking Products, Dashboard Widgets
test_cases: Given a customer's profile data, When the dashboard loads, Then display personalized content according to the customer's eligibility.

title: Implement Responsive Design
description: As a user, I want the portal to be responsive across all device types so that I can use it seamlessly on different screens.
attributes_and_rules: Use responsive UI frameworks. Adjust layouts automatically.
acceptance_criteria: User interface adjusts seamlessly to different screen sizes.
test_cases: Given a device with various screen sizes, When the user accesses the portal, Then the interface should adjust and provide a consistent experience.

title: Comply with Accessibility Guidelines
description: As a user with disabilities, I want the portal to comply with WCAG 2.1 guidelines so that I can access all features.
attributes_and_rules: Follow WCAG 2.1 standards. Ensure accessibility for all users.
test_cases: Given WCAG 2.1 criteria, When users with disabilities access the portal, Then they should be able to use all functionalities.

epic_title: Online Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Develop Guided Workflow for Account Opening
description: As a customer, I want a guided workflow to open new accounts online so that I can complete the process efficiently.
attributes_and_rules: Include form validations and automated KYC/AML verification.
acceptance_criteria: Account opening workflow is available and guided.
test_cases: Given a new account application, When the user follows the guided workflow, Then the process should be validated and completed as per regulations.

epic_title: Online Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Enable Service Modification through Portal
description: As a customer, I want to modify my current services online so that I can manage my banking products conveniently.
attributes_and_rules: Provide step-by-step guidance for service modification.
acceptance_criteria: Service modification can be completed online in guided steps.
test_cases: Given existing services, When the user wants to modify them, Then the guided workflow should allow modifications efficiently.

title: Allow Save and Resume of In-Progress Applications
description: As a customer, I want the ability to save my incomplete application and resume it later so that I don't lose progress.
attributes_and_rules: Persist data securely and allow resumes from any device.
acceptance_criteria: Applications can be saved and resumed securely.
test_cases: Given an in-progress application, When the user saves the application, Then the same user should be able to resume it later from any device.

title: Implement Secure Document Upload Functionality
description: As a customer, I want to upload documents securely as part of the application process so that my information is verified.
attributes_and_rules: Encrypt, virus-scan, and validate uploaded documents.
acceptance_criteria: Document upload feature is secure and validates the uploaded files.
test_cases: Given document upload requirements, When the user uploads a document, Then the system should encrypt, scan, and validate the file.

title: Enable Real-Time Request Tracking and Notifications
description: As a customer, I want to track the status of my requests in real-time and receive notifications so that I am updated on the progress.
attributes_and_rules: Provide real-time updates and notifications via SMS/email.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can track requests in real-time and receive notifications.
test_cases: Given a request submission, When the status changes, Then the customer should be notified via SMS/email.

epic_title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Trail
title: Maintain Detailed Interaction History
description: As a customer, I want to access my interaction history within the portal so that I can review my activities.
attributes_and_rules: Record and store immutable, timestamped audit logs.
acceptance_criteria: Interaction history is recorded and accessible to customers.
test_cases: Given user activities, When actions are performed, Then they should be logged in a detailed, immutable audit trail.

title: Integrate Portal with Core Banking System
description: As a bank, I want the portal to synchronize data with the core banking system so that real-time information is available to customers.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure bidirectional communication, error handling, and data consistency.
acceptance_criteria: Data is synchronized in real-time between the portal and core banking system.
test_cases: Given core banking data, When changes occur, Then the portal should reflect these changes in real-time.

title: Implement Role-Based Access Control
description: As an administrator, I want to configure role-based access control so that permissions are managed per user role.
attributes_and_rules: Restrict visibility and permissions based on user roles.
acceptance_criteria: Permissions and feature visibility are controlled by user roles.
test_cases: Given user roles, When different users login, Then their access should be restricted based on the assigned role.

epic_title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
title: Set Up Dedicated Portal Database
description: As a developer, I want a dedicated database for the portal so that performance is optimized and reliability is maintained.
attributes_and_rules: Create dedicated database architecture and implement performance optimizations.
acceptance_criteria: Portal database is optimized for performance and reliability.
test_cases: Given the portal database, When performance is monitored, Then it should show optimized response times and reliability.
